title: Lucian Skin Pack
body: Just bought Lucians chroma pack, being dying to play in all red and shoot my blue light. Anyways bought it, went to game and ... no option to even change skin. i log off try again, nothing... what am i supposed to do to see my skins? i was told that its in the same area as changing the skin and yet i cant. HELP!!!!

replies.body:
Hey LordHalfBreed, 

Changing your chroma is located in the same spot as when you'd normally change a skin. 

In your case, you'll need to select his base skin, and then you'll see colored squares on the card. Click on the one you'd like to use.

I've attached a similar example with Pool Party Leona. 

If you have any more questions about this, please feel free to let me know!
This is all that is popping up! I paid for it you can even look at my account and see that and yet i dont have it :( what now

Oh! That's because you're in Team Builder and the functionality isn't implemented for that particular queue yet. We're hoping to have it in next patch, if all goes as planned, I believe.  If you want to try and load them up in a custom quickly, you should see them no problem - that's how I loaded up Pool Party Leona. 

That said, I've seen a workaround on Reddit where if you select and use a chroma in a normal game, it will be already set in Team Builder. Haven't tried it myself, but I've seen several people say it works.
Ok i see it does show up in custom, and ill try the work around and see if that works until the next patch! thanks for working through this with me!
In approximately 36 hours this will be fixed.
I was right, It's Thursday. YAY.

Isn't the next patch on Thursday? IIRC I saw the fixes on PBE for it. 

Bring 5.9 faster pls.
